articles.title: Riot police clash with hooligans during Pride march in Serbian capital - CBC News
articles.description: Riot police clashed Saturday with soccer hooligans in downtown Belgrade, where a pan-European Pride march was held despite threats from anti-gay groups and an official earlier ban on the march in the traditionally conservative Balkan state.
articles.content: Riot police clashed Saturday with soccer hooligans in downtown Belgrade, where a pan-European Pride march was held despite threats from anti-gay groups and an official earlier ban on the march in the… [+2878 chars]

articles.title: Serbia police clash with right-wing protesters at LGBTQ march - Reuters
articles.description: Police clashed with right-wing protesters on Saturday as several thousand people joined an LGBTQ march in Serbia to mark the end of EuroPride week, an event staged in a different European city each year.
articles.content: BELGRADE, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Police clashed with right-wing protesters on Saturday as several thousand people joined an LGBTQ march in Serbia to mark the end of EuroPride week, an event staged in a … [+1656 chars]

articles.title: Young Scientist winners take top prize at EU contest - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Aditya Kumar and Aditya Joshi took first prize at the European Union Contest for Young Scientists.
articles.content:
THE WINNERS OF this years BT Young Scientist and Technology Exhibition have won the top prize at the European Union Contest for Young Scientists (EUCYS).
